subject: Re: Junit task and JUnitReport task failing
msgSnippet: it says not able to find junit task: what could be the problem here?
messageBody:
it says not able to find junit task: what could be the problem here?

<target name="create-html" depends="init,compile,execute" description="creates a html report">
<junit printsummary="true" fork="true" haltonfailure="false">
<classpath refid="run.class"/>
<formatter type="brief" usefile="false"/>
<formatter type="xml"/>
<test name="ServiceTest"/>
</junit>
<echo>executed junit !</echo>

<junitreport todir="${sourcedir}">
<fileset dir="${sourcedir}">
<include name="TEST-*.xml" />
</fileset>
<report format="frames" todir="${sourcedir}" />
</junitreport>
<echo>Created Test Report!</echo>
</target>
